title: Web Development Practical Competency Enhancement: Predictive Model-Based Satisfaction for E-Learning Platform Usability Improvement

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level subject-matter expertise and problem-solving abilities
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can improve learning efficiency metrics (time/task completion rate) by over 20% through e-learning platform interface analysis
Learners can diagnose platform usability using four core evaluation criteria: learnability, efficiency, effectiveness, and content design
Learners can propose actionable usability improvements applicable to real educational scenarios through project-based assessments

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
